description: He and Hiromi`s father were good friends. After Hiromi`s father died, he took her in. Unlike his wife, he respects his son`s privacy and lets him do as he wishes, saying that "Shin`ichirou is Shin`ichirou". Furthermore, he considers Hiromi to be a member of the family and does not treat her badly like his wife.
name: Shin`ichirou no Chichi
